Description: JOB OBJECTIVE: To provide assistance to the daily operational services of the ships to ensure that all the requirements are properly provided and acknowledged by all related parties (on and off board) for the proper movements of the ships.Skills
Skills: Minimum Qualification-•2nd Officer License from an Institution of Shipping Studies. • Master Mariner / Chief Officer (with onshore working experience)

Job Specific Skills: • Good communication skills. • Advanced reporting skills. • Good coordination, planning, and organizational skills. • Time management skills. • Ability to work under pressure. • Fluency in English
